original_title: Sri Lanka declares day of mourning after Iranian President Raisi’s death
original_body_lines: The Government of Sri Lanka has declared tomorrow (21 May) as a day of mourning in view of the death of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi.

Accordingly, the Secretary to the Ministry of Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government Mr. Pradeep Yasaratne has informed that the National Flag be placed half-mast at all state institutions on Tuesday (21).
